## TextAreaBuilderOptions.cursorStyle property

Style for the cursor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
cursorStyle?: Style;
```

## Remarks

Uses `Style` from `@boba-cli/chapstick` to apply terminal colors and formatting to the cursor.
